param.name: always_show_faqs
param.label: Always show faq list
param.description: Always show faq list even when not in a category

param.name: hide_allfaqs
param.label: Hide 'All FAQs'
param.description: Hide the all faqs option in category listing

param.name: hide_search
param.label: Hide Search
param.description: Hide the search option in category listing

param.name: num_cat_colums
param.label: Number Of Category Colums
param.description: How many colums to list the faq categories in. No effect when 'Category View Mode' is not 'Normal List'

param.name: view_mode_incat
param.label: FAQs Within Category View Mode
param.description: FAQ List View mode when showed inline with categories. No effect when above is set to 'Normal List'. NOTE: You cannot have both category list and faqs as accordian at the same time.

param.name: always_show_cats
param.label: Always Show Cat list
param.description: Always show category list even when in a cetegory

param.name: enable_pages
param.label: Enable Pages
param.description: Enable page support on faq listings
